items.sentence: I thought we had agreed that you would study harder.
Who\'s going to take care of my dog while I\'m gone?
I used to sing professionally, but I don\'t anymore.
I want Tom to keep doing just what he\'s been doing.
I don\'t allow my kids to watch TV on school nights.
I don\'t think Tom was the one who stole my bicycle.
I don\'t think Tom is going to be a problem anymore.
Tom dozed off sitting in the sun on his front porch.
Tom entered the building through an unlocked window.
Tom finished his drink and then ordered another one.
